about: I am very passionate about developing quality software. Whilst taking up new challenges with a positive attitude I constantly keep myself up to date with the latest technologies and ensure that the best practices are followed.

experience.summary:
Mainly responsible for the frontend of Acunetix products. I designed and implemented a complete frontend rewrite including a new architecture and user experience. Also, I am constantly delivering new features while maintaining and enhancing existing ones.
Technologies used:

As a senior frontend engineer I provide frontend solutions that meet customers' requirements.
Technologies used:

Responsible for developing and maintaining features for different products.
Technologies used:

Responsible for developing and maintaining features, interfacing to REST APIs. Also involved in the upgrade of a project to Angular 2+.
Technologies used:

Neurotech's main product is Mente, a medical system that helps children on the Autism spectrum. Mente application interfaces with Neurotech's proprietary Mente EEG headband over WIFI to directly influence the child's music therapy.

detail.item: Responsible for the overall architecture of software solutions of medical devices
Person of reference for critical projects
Collaborate with the hardware team to design an effective communication protocol when interfacing with medical hardware
Push towards overall quality and maintainability of code with a can do attitude.
Native Mobile Development including IOS(Objective C) and Android(Java)
The full product lifecycle from requirements analysis, design and development to testing and deployment
The support of junior team members; and
The creation of standard operating procedures and technical documentation templates relating to the software lifecycle. This is done in conformance with ISO 13485.

experience.summary: Responsible for building and maintaining Dynamics CRM solutions. Involved in all stages of the software development lifecycle comprising analysis, design, development, testing, deployment and support
